flavorText: As the muscle cords of the creature twitched, Hanna saw an unsettling unanimity in the others' rippling flesh. She didn't know what it meant, but she urged Sisay to keep the ship at a safe distance.

foreignData.flavorText: Als die Muskelstränge der Kreatur sich verhärteten, entdeckte Hanna beunruhigende Parallelen in den Körpern der anderen. Sie wusste nicht genau, was dies zu bedeuten hatte, bat aber Sisay, dass Schiff in sicherer Entfernung vorbei zu steuern.
foreignData.name: Sehnenremasuri

foreignData.flavorText: Mientras los músculos de la criatura temblaban, Hanna vio una unanimidad inquietante en las líneas que se movían por los lomos de los otros. No sabía qué significaba, pero le dijo a Sisay que mantuviera la nave a una distancia prudencial.
foreignData.name: Fragmentado de tendones

foreignData.flavorText: Tandis que les ligaments de la créature s'étiraient, Hanna remarqua avec horreur un mouvement de chair identique sur les autres. Elle ignorait ce que cela voulait dire, mais elle conseilla à Sissay de maintenir le navire à distance.
foreignData.name: Slivoïde ligamenteux

foreignData.flavorText: Mentre le fasce muscolari della creatura si contraevano, Hanna vide un'inquietante compattezza nella carne increspata delle altre. Non capiva cosa significasse, ma esortò Sisay a mantenere la nave a una distanza di sicurezza.
foreignData.name: Tramutante Nerboruto

foreignData.flavorText: その生物の筋肉の糸が震えたとき、ハナは他の生物の肉が不安定にさざめきあっているのを見つけた。それが何を意味しているのか彼女にはわからなかったが、船との間に安全な距離を保つようシッセイに力説することとなった。
foreignData.name: 筋力スリヴァー
foreignData.text: すべてのスリヴァー・クリーチャーは＋１/＋１の修整を受ける。

foreignData.flavorText: Quando as fibras musculares da criatura se contraíram, Hanna viu uma unanimidade perturbadora na carne pulsante das demais. Ela não sabia o que aquilo queria dizer, mas insistiu com Sisay para manter a embarcação a uma distância segura.
foreignData.name: Fractius do Tendão

foreignData.flavorText: Жилы существа задрожали, и Ханна с тревогой заметила, что плоть остальных тварей пошла волнами в унисон. Она не знала, что это значит, но попросила Сисэй держать корабль на безопасном расстоянии.

foreignData.flavorText: 当这生物的肌腱抽动时，哈娜发现其他个体的肌肉颤动出现了混乱却一致的规律。她不知道这代表的意义为何，但立即警告西赛让船保持安全距离。

name: Sinew Sliver

rulings.text: Abilities that Slivers grant, as well as power/toughness boosts, are cumulative. However, for some abilities, like flying, having more than one instance of the ability doesn’t provide any additional benefit.
If the creature type of a Sliver changes so it’s no longer a Sliver, it will no longer be affected by its own ability. Its ability will continue to affect other Sliver creatures.
Because damage remains marked on a creature until the damage is removed as the turn ends, nonlethal damage dealt to a Sliver may become lethal if Sinew Sliver leaves the battlefield during that turn.
Sinew Sliver's ability does give itself +1/+1.
